markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hard Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=1001) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 37 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tailed Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=37) heritage

</column>

---

Your tail is much stronger than most, and you can lash out with it with the strength of a whip. You gain a tail unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

<title level="2">Hard Tail leads to...</title>
[Tail Spin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1004)
name: Hard Tail
